property.name: spark.history.ui.port
property.description: The port to which the web interface of the History Server binds.

property.name: spark.driver.memory
property.description: Amount of memory to use for the YARN Application Master.

property.name: spark.yarn.executor.memoryOverhead
property.description: The amount of off heap memory (in megabytes) to be allocated per executor. This is memory that accounts for things like VM overheads, interned strings, other native overheads, etc.

property.name: spark.yarn.driver.memoryOverhead
property.description: The amount of off heap memory (in megabytes) to be allocated per driver. This is memory that accounts for things like VM overheads, interned strings, other native overheads, etc.

property.name: spark.yarn.queue
property.description: The name of the YARN queue to which the application is submitted.

property.name: spark.driver.extraJavaOptions
property.description: Specifies parameters that are passed to the JVM of the Spark driver.

property.name: spark.yarn.am.extraJavaOptions
property.description: Specifies the parameters that are passed to the JVM of the Spark Application Master.
